column1: Data source: Fishbase, Froese, R. and D. Pauly. Editors. 2019. FishBase. World Wide Web electronic publication. www.fishbase.org

Data accessed using: Boettiger, C., Lang, D. T., & Wainwright, P. C. (2012). rfishbase: exploring, manipulating and visualizing FishBase data from R. Journal of Fish Biology, 81, 2030Ð2039. Data downloaded on 21.8.2019.
